de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.client

Interface IClientAnswerView


  • public interface IClientAnswerView
    This methods is called if an answer is shown from the customer history tree.
    was:
    ClientAntwortAnzeigen

    • Method Detail

      • getExtButtonList

        List<AbstractButton> getExtButtonList(Answer answer)
        Adds buttons right to the toolbar. This function is executed before the answer panel will be visible.
        Parameters:
        answer - the current Answer
        Returns:
        a List of buttons

      • getTabList

        List<JComponent> getTabList(Question question,
                          Answer answer)
        Returns a list of tabs which can be added right on the tabbed pane. This function will be executed before the answer panel will be visible.
        Parameters:
        question - the current question
        answer - the current answer
        Returns:
        a list of tabs

      • preAnswerSend

        boolean preAnswerSend(String loginname,
                    boolean isOperatorMode,
                    Question question,
                    Answer answer)
        Is called before an answer will be sent.
        Parameters:
        loginname - the operator name that is logged in
        isOperatorMode - true, if the question is opened in operatormode, otherwise false
        question - the current question
        answer - the current answer
        Returns:
        true if the answer may be sent, false if the answer may not be sent.
        was:
        preAntwortSende

                        Question question,
                        Answer answer,
